title: Who is the most attractive game show contestant in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: Just about the only game show I watch is Jeopardy!, which has had its share of attractive contestants, who also impress with their enviable intellects.  Brad Rutter, winner, 2019 Tournament of Champions; he is the highest-earning American game show contestant of all time and the highest-earning contestant on Jeopardy! ($4,788,436)  James Holzhauer won $2,464,216 in 33 Jeopardy!, third-highest overall winning contestant; set single-game multiple records for most money won. Ken Jennings (right), 74-game Jeopardy! champion with total lifetime winnings of $3,370,700, second-highest in the show’s history.  Julia Collins has the third longest winning streak and fifth highest total earnings in Jeopardy! regular play history. She is the top female contestant in both categories.
Sorry Sean, couldn’t find any cute contestants, but I did find a gorgeous model!  She was a frequent model on The Price is Right from 2002–2009. Isn’t she stunning?
